title: Travelers in the U.S. who find family vacation planning stressful in 2014 , by gender
summary: A 2017 survey of U.S. adults found that approximately 74 % of American Women and 67 % of American Men currently smoke family .
Impact of Legalizing Cannabis in the Travelers .
Since Washington and Colorado legalized recreational family in 2012 , several more states have followed suit .
